content: I think I'd prefer a slim wallet, something that can hold around 5-6 cards and some cash. I usually carry my debit card, ID, a few credit cards, and some loyalty cards. Occasionally, I have some cash, but not always. As for the budget, I'd like to stay under $50. By the way, I recall buying my new backpack on March 10th from the outlet store in the mall for $80, and it's been a great purchase so far.
